content: hey friends and fellow crafters I just got back from mace West which is a
Nashville North Carolina my daughter actually lives in Nashville so it was
great she helped me Kodi M so she would hand
me terrain and stuff that was awesome I'm so glad we got the game together and
everything but the video this video today is about Matthew Halstead of
Halstead leather and he does fantastic items I've already got a leather DM
journal from him and I just love it now I've done another video on that but I'm
gonna show it again in this video but my wife fell in love with another journal
that he has she wanted her own journal and she fell in love with it and so she
picked it up at his table and he also gave me another item that is just really
cool so I wanted to show you guys this stuff and let's hit the table and I'll
give you a peek so here's the first object I want to show you my wife picked
this up because I had got a journal and look at the work here you know just
amazing the leather work the metal work you know everything and the coloring is
just amazing here's a symbol here and just so cool and there's like a quartz
and you know to the front and you can open that chain and get into the journal
here and she just got this journal so it's brand-new but you can see that you
know it has bands in here to hold this book so you would never lose the cover
you could replace the book and then just keep the cover forever you know for your
entire life so that is you know these are expensive but it's money well-spent
right because they're works of art and here's another item he has that I got
it's a case so you just open it up with the and then remove the band and look at
that coloring just so awesome like the distressing and the coloring he just
uses top quality leather with this stuff and the idea is you can have a note that
you could pass to the players and you could kind of rip the note out and
reglue it back in so you could use like you know hot glue a little bit of hot
glue or some white glue to just tack that back in and then or you the players
could use it for a scroll case so just really neat and you just roll it up and
then wrap around with the leather and hook it in neat stuff just really
neat that's just really a tactile object at the table right and here's my DM
Journal and wow you know you can take the pin out here it opens and all that
work on the front that's got a little gems embedded in it and yeah so here's
my kind of DM journal I have and you can't replace it when you fill it up so
I've got stuff going on in here and you can replace that when you fill it up so
it's just you never lose this like you know you can always have this cover you
just replace the book so neat stuff just the metal work and the leather work is
just top-notch and I just want to show you guys these things cuz I'm just so
impressed with his work and there we go there is my journal and has a little
symbol there on the back house dead leather and the metalwork holding the
flap there that holds the pin holds the book shut hey guys I hope you liked what
you saw it was also so fun because Matthews a active member of this
community and he got to game with me so that was so fun unfortunately killed him
in the game but we had a blast and yeah he's a great gamer he he role played to
the hill it was so much fun and yeah I just wanted to say that thank you
Matthew and I hope we get the game again man that was so great and if you guys
are looking for the links for this fantastic stuff check out the links
below the video because you guys are will not regret getting his stuff it's
so so awesome so fantastic he is a true artist so you guys take care happy
gaming go forth the craft
you
